body_html:
Seems strange - since v2 should be a superset of the ops in v1. Perhaps a difference in something like constant folding? (maybe try changing the optimization level in the session options)

Probably easiest to just grab a timeline of each (or use the profiler) and see which ops actually get run.

Also, several of the tensors involved are 1.6GB so this might cause some interesting differences in memory allocation?

body:
Seems strange - since v2 should be a superset of the ops in v1.  Perhaps a difference in something like constant folding?   (maybe try changing the optimization level in the session options) 

Probably easiest to just grab a timeline of each (or use the profiler) and see which ops actually get run.

Also, several of the tensors involved are 1.6GB so this *might* cause some interesting differences in memory allocation?
